about_the_game:
About this game

Before you buy your first place to grow your business, you have to work hard for it. But don't worry, you already have all the necessary tools for the job in your apartment, because you have completed a certain journalism project for which they were needed. As you develop your career path, you will be moving to larger and larger offices that you need to clean and renovate first, and then hire employees with the appropriate qualifications to help you expand your business and earn more money for yourself. Remember to be careful when publishing your articles about individuals around the world, because in the future, positive or negative relationships with those individuals can bring both advantages and disadvantages.


Play your way

It is YOU who choose your career path and YOU decide what direction it will take. When building articles, you can choose the type of your statement, whether it will be negative or positive, everything depends on you. Be sure to publish your newspapers wisely as they may have different results in the future.


Build your empire

With the right amount of money, you will be able to move to your new dream office, which you first need to clean up and renovate to be able to start working there properly and hire your employees.




Think, then do

Try to work smart, not hard. Leave trivial and easy articles for your employees to work on, and choose the heavy ones, which can directly and strongly affect your career and opinion in the world, for yourself. Remember that the chosen path has given perks, so think twice which direction you will choose. In one, you have a chance to earn more money, and in the other, fans, while the decision is up to you and your preferences, which in your opinion is more important and has greater potential.


Rest

Later in the game, rest will become your job, so you can focus on other activities. Employed employees will start making various articles for you, and thanks to this, you will have free time for yourself, which you can spend on managing the company, developing it with new opportunities, or leaving time for rest or entertainment, which will make your time spent more pleasant.

content_descriptors.notes: Naked blurry photos, a lot of sexual/drugs topics, a lot of controversial topics

It is YOU who choose your career path and YOU decide what direction it will take. When building articles, you can choose the type of your statement, whether it will be negative or positive, everything depends on you. name: My Newspaper

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit or later
  • Processor: Intel i5-2500 3.3GHz or AMD r3 1200 3.1GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 2GB or AMD r9 270x 2GB
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-3500 3.3GHz or AMD r3 1200 3.1GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 770 4GB or AMD r9 270x 4GB
  • Storage: 5 MB available space

short_description: Become a journalist and earn money while developing your skills. Think carefully about your career path as it can have both negative and positive effects. You decide what is truth and what is false, news or fakenews
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
*languages with full audio support
